item.description:
@nbk4life wrote:

ok so am adding pvp to my server and i add the cords and they i get on and i cant attack anyone anywhere not evern in wild and i dont have the icon with skull at the bottom so look at the cords and tell me what i did wrong??

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715 || absX >= 3332 && absX <= 3356 && absY >= 3244 && absY <=3257) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(3); // -dead fury outStream.writeByteA(1); outStream.writeString("Attack"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); return true; } } else if (Type == 2) { if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942)) { return true;
